title: [SOLVED]820-2523 Kernel Panic
message:
Hello!

I´m working on the 820-2523 board. The problem is when you press the power button the Apple logo appears and after that i get this picture. Is this a cap like in 820-2850?

any ideas?

Thanks!

title: [SOLVED]820-2523 Kernel Panic
message: Looks like a corrupt OS to me.

title: [SOLVED]820-2523 Kernel Panic
message:
Solved! Indeed it was a corrupt OS
Thank´s!
